item.title: Project Operations Copilots
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Introduction to Project Operations Copilots Managing projects effectively requires careful attention to documentation, reporting, and smooth transitions between team members.

item.title: Project Reports System: A Case Study
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: At Dwarves, we’ve developed a monthly Project Reports system - a lean, efficient system that transforms our communication data into actionable intelligence for our Operations team.
